attributes.action: replace the current electoral system with proportional representation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Campaign for Proportional Representation

We propose to reform the voting system in the UK with a system that provides broad proportional representation, such as the AV+ system recommended by the Jenkins Commission. Such a reform will ensure that the choices of voters are more accurately represented in the British parliament.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "replace the current electoral system with proportional representation."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14135.asp

Prime Minister's Office
